FuncDef: The display mpls ldp remote-peer command displays information about a remote LDP peer.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of a remote LDP peer. The name is defined using the mpls ldp remote-peer command.
The name is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Displays information about the LDP remote peer of a specified peer ID.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
Remote LDP peers are used to set up remote LDP sessions to transmit VPN services.
To view information about configured remote LDP peers, run the display mpls ldp remote-peer command.
Prerequisites
A remote LDP peer has been configured.
